Music by     Yuvan Shankar Raja
Directed by     Jyothi Krishna

Ravikrishna is a carefree college student. Along with his friends he enjoys his days in college without bothering about his academics. His life is changed after he meets Tamanna, who is the sister of a powerful State Minister (Atul Kulkarni). The rich and the arrogant girl develop bad vibes with Ravikrishna. Meanwhile, another classmate Ileana gets introduced to Ravikrishna. They become close. She inculcates discipline and helps Ravikrishna shine well in his academics too. Eventually both fall in love. Now enters Tamanna on a mission to separate the couple. She decides to go to any extreme and even use her power, influence and money to get them estranged. Whether she succeeds in her attempts forms the rest of the story.

Prashanth and Nasser play dual roles in this film. Viswanathan or Visu (Prashanth) and Ramamurthy or Ramu (Prashanth) are the twin sons of Nasser and the three of them manage an Indian restaurant in Los Angeles. Nasser doesn't encourage even a hint of a difference between his sons and makes sure the two even dress alike. Aishwarya Rai and her grandmother Lakshmi arrive in Los Angeles for an operation for Lakshmi and during their stay, love blooms between Visu and Aishwarya. When Nasser declares that he would marry his sons to twin girls only, Lakshmi fibs that Aishwarya too is one of a pair of twins. When Nasser and his sons travel to India to meet the other girl, Aishwarya begins to pose as Vaishnavi, the second twin. How the love pair come out of this tangle is the rest of the story.

Watch Unnai Ninaithu Full Tamil Movie Here! Unnai Ninaithu is a 2002 Tamil Movie. Unnai Ninaithu Tamil Movie stars Suriya, Sneha and Laila in lead roles. Unnai NInaithu Full Movie Tamil also stars Charlie, R.Sundarrajan, Chithra Lakshmanan and Ramesh Khanna in supporting roles. Unnai Ninaithu Tamil Movie was directed by Vikraman. Unnai Ninaithu songs are composed by Sirpy.

Unnai Ninaithu Movie stars Suriya as a receptionist in a lodge. Sneha comes with her family to the lodge where her father works as the manager. Sneha falls in love with Suriya seeing his polite ways. Suriya informs her of his past where Suriya was in love with Laila. Laila's family is poverty stricken and Suriya helps them financially. But Laila leaves Suriya for a richer guy. snippet.description:
Nallavanukku Nallavan | Tamil Movie Comedy | Rajnikanth | Karthik | Radhika | Full Tamil Movie Comedy | Comedy Scenes

Nallavanuku Nallavan is a Superhit Tamil film Directed by SP. Muthuraman, Music by Illayaraja,  Produced by AVM, Starring Rajinikanth, Radhika, Karthick Visu, Major Sundararajan, Thulasi, Y.G. Mahendran and others

Rajnikant is a vibrant youth who cannot tolerate injustice. This attitude lands him in trouble. Radhika enters his life and later becomes his consort. She attempts to reform him. Thanks to Major Sundararajan and Visu she succeeds. Visu incurs a loss and plans to close his factory. Rajni persuades him to give him a chance to revive it and with hard efforts he repays all debts. As a token of gratitude Visu gives all his wealth to Rajni before his . Time passes by. Rajni in his middle age runs the factory to everyone's satisfaction. Rajni also controls the financial affairs of Visu's family. But Karthik, Visu's son is not in good terms with Rajni. Karthik tries to avenge Rajni by luring Rajni's daughter Thulasi. He brainwashes Thulasi and marries her much to the agony of Rajni and Radhika. The aftermath of this marriage is the climax.
